actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill to modify and extend the temporary duty suspension on certain giardiniera prepared or preserved otherwise than by vinegar.

summary.text: Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to: (1) amend the article description of certain giardiniera prepared or preserved otherwise than by vinegar; and (2) extend temporarily the suspension of duty on such article.

titles.title: A bill to modify and extend the temporary duty suspension on certain giardiniera prepared or preserved otherwise than by vinegar.
